price: 10. »Y (ahora) no sabemos si algún mal va a suceder a quienes habitan la tierra o si Al-lah quiere guiarlos (por el camino recto).
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fī al-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadan
